item.description:
Sean Faircloth is Executive Director of the Secular Coalition of America. He will be giving a talk titled "One Nation Under the Constitution: A Vision of a Secular America" on Tuesday, April 12, 2011 at 6:30 p.m., Unitarian Universalist Church of Worcester, 90 Holden Street, Worcester, MA. Sponsored by the Greater Worcester Humanists.

The Boston Atheists organization is a local affiliate of American Atheists, Inc., itself a member of the Secular Coalition of America.
item.why: this is the local talk on Faircloth's NE tour. Other efforts are listed at http://secular.org/events.
item.name: Sean Faircloth: A Vision of a Secular America
